instruction: Explain two ways artificial intelligence can be used in medicine.
output: Artificial intelligence can be used in medicine in a variety of ways. First, it can be used to automate tasks such as record keeping, scheduling, and laboratory tests. Furthermore, AI can be used to analyze medical images and diagnose diseases. AI can also help physicians in recognizing patterns and supporting decision-making. Additionally, AI can be used to predict risk or progression of diseases. Finally, AI can be used to provide personalized treatments to patients by analyzing individual data points to determine the best treatment plan.
